The Warrior (Constitution)

The Warrior is the first Guardian Constellation and he protects his charges during their Seasons. The Warrior's own season is Last Seed, when his Strength is needed for the harvest. His charges are the Lady, the Steed, and the Lord. Those born under the sign of the Warrior are skilled with weapons of all kinds, but prone to short tempers.
Those born under the sign of the Warrior may add +1 to their Constitution or to their Strength Ability Scores.

The Mage (Intelligence)
The Mage (Wisdom)

The Mage is a Guardian Constellation who's Season is Rain's Hand, when Magicka was first used by mankind. His charges are the Apprentice, the Atronach, and the Ritual. Those born under the Mage have more Magicka and talent for all kinds of spellcasting, but are often arrogant and absent-minded.
Those born under the sign of the Mage may add +1 to their Intelligence or to their Wisdom Ability Scores.
The Thief (Dexterity)
The Thief (Charisma)

The Thief is the last Guardian Constellation, and her Season is the darkest month of Evening Star. Her charges are the Lover, the Shadow, and the Tower. Those born under the sign of the Thief are not typically thieves, though they take risks more often and only rarely come to harm. They will run out of luck eventually, however, and rarely live as long as those born under other signs.
Those born under the sign of the Thief may add +1 to their Dexterity or to their Charisma Ability Scores.

The Lady

The Lady is one of the Warrior's charges, and her Season is Hearthfire. Those born under the sign of the Lady are kind and tolerant.
Those born under the sign of the Lady may add their Constitution Modifier to their hit points an extra time when levelling up.
Lady's Favor
Those born under the sign of the Lady may add twice their Level to their hit points when levelling up.

The Steed

The Steed is one of the Warrior's charges, and her Season is Mid Year. Those born under the sign of the Steed are impatient, and always hurrying from one place to another.
Those born under the sign of the Speed gain an additional 1.5m of movement.
Charioteer
Those born under the sign of the Speed gain an additional 1.5m of movement.
The Steed is one of the Warrior's charges, and her Season is Mid Year. Those born under the sign of the Steed are impatient, and always hurrying from one place to another.
The Lord

The Lord's Season is First Seed, and he oversees all of Tamriel during the planting. Those born under the sign of the Lord are stronger and healthier than those born under other signs.
Those born under the sign of the Lord are vulnerable to Fire. They also gain the ability Blood of the North, which allows them to regenerate health.
Trollkin

Blood of the North
Your Lordly blood heals you for 3 points at the beginning of each of your turns for the duration of the power.
Your Lordly blood is giving you [1] at the start of each turn.
The Apprentice

The Apprentice's Season is Sun's Height. Those born under the sign of the Apprentice have a special affinity for magic of all kinds, but are equally as vulnerable to it.
Those born under the sign of the Apprentice are vulnerable to Magical attacks. You also gain an additional 1st Level Spell Slot, and recieve the spell Thunderwave.
Elfborn
You are vulnerable to Magical attacks. You also gain an additional 1st Level Spell Slot, and receive the spell Thunderwave.
The Apprentice's Season is Sun's Height. Those born under the sign of the Apprentice have a special affinity for magic of all kinds, but are equally as vulnerable to it.
The Atronach

The Atronach's season is Sun's Dusk. Those born under this sign are natural sorcerers with deep reserves of Magicka, but they cannot generate Magicka on their own. Those born under the sign of the Atronach cannot regain spell slots above level 3 through a rest, but instead through being targeted by a hostile spell. Cantrips require a 1st-level Spell Slot to cast. They have two additional 1st level Spell Slots, and gain twice as many Spell Slots when levelling up.
The Ritual

The Ritual is one of the Mage's charges, and its season is Morning Star. Those born under this sign have a variety of abilities depending on the aspects of the moons and the Divines.
Those born under the sign of the Ritual are blessed with the abilities Mara's Gift and Blessed Word.
The Ritual
You receive the powers of Mara's Gift and Blessed Word
Mara's Gift
Once per short or long rest, you may restore an amount of hit points equal to [1].
Blessed Word
All undead within a 10 foot sphere within range are frightened. You may use this power once per long rest.
The Lover

The Lover is one of the Thief's charges, and her season is Sun's Dawn. Those born under the sign of the Lover are graceful and passionate.
Those born under the sign of the Lover have proficiency in Performance, Persuasion, and Athletics. You also have the ability Lover's Embrace.
Mooncalf
You have proficiency in Performance, Persuasion, and Athletics. You also have the ability Lover's Embrace.
Lover's Embrace
You reach out to embrace a creature. The target must make a Willpower saving throw against your Spell Save DC.
The Shadow

The Shadow's season is Second Seed. The Shadow grants those born under her sign the ability to hide in shadows. They often go unnoticed even when their presence should be obvious.
Those born under the sign of the Shadow are proficient in Stealth, have the power to become invisible at will.
Moonshadow
You have proficiency in Stealth, and gain the power Moonshadow.
Moonshadow
When using this power, you and the items you carry are invisible. This invisibility lasts until either the duration ends, or you declare an action, including picking up an item or opening a door.
The Tower

The Tower is one of the Thief's charges, and its season is Frostfall. Those born under the sign of the Tower have a knack for finding gold and can open locks of all kinds.
Those born under the sign of the Shadow are proficient in Sleight of Hand, have the power to unlock objects.
Warden
Those born under the sign of the Shadow are proficient in Sleight of Hand, and have the Tower Key ability, allowing them to unlock objects.
Tower Key
Once per long rest, you may unlock any locked object.
The Serpent

The Serpent wanders about the sky and has no season, though its motions are predictable to a defree. No characteristics are common toall who are born under the sign of the Serpent. Those born under this sign are the most blessed and the most cursed.
Those born under the sign of the Shadow have an additional Bonus Action, as well as the Star-Cursed power.
Star-Curse
Once per long rest, you can inflict poison on a creature that you touch, causing them to take [1] per turn for the duration of the power.
Star-Cursed
You've been cursed by one born under the sign of the Serpent. At the end of each turn, you take [1].
You've cursed a character with your Star-Curse. You share in the pain, taking [1].
